title: Dealmaster: Lenovo’s ThinkPad doorbusters top Memorial Day deals
content:
The X1 Carbon's fingerprint reader. (credit: Casey Johnston)

Among other things, Memorial Day marks the unofficial start of summer. Hopefully, you're headed to the mountains, a beach, or at least grilling something during the long weekend. It's no time for Dealmaster to take it easy, though—retailers know you're off work. So lots of companies have launched deals and discounts.

This weekend is a great time to get a new smartwatch for tracking your outdoor activities or a blender to whip up a protein shake after your workout. Our favorite deal, if you're in the market for a new laptop, comes from Lenovo's sale on various ThinkPad and gaming models. There are also sales on new TVs, headphones, robot vacuums, and other practical tech accessories.

Laptops and tablets

The deck has a fingerprint reader/power button above the keyboard. (credit: Scharon Harding)

  • Lenovo Legion Pro 7i Gen 8 (16-inch) with 13th Gen Intel Core i9, RTX 4090 for $3,190 (was $3,600) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 31 (15-inch) with 13th Gen Intel Core i3 for $460 with MAYOFFER coupon (was $660) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo Slim 7i (14-inch) with 13th Gen Intel Core i5 for $826 with SURPRISES coupon (was $1,180) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo Legion Pro 5i Gen 8 (16-inch) with AMD Ryzen 7 7745HX, RTX 4070 for $1,600 (was $1,900) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Titanium Yoga (13-inch) with 11th Gen Intel Core i7 for $800 with THINKVICW1 coupon (was $2,099) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 (14-inch) with 12th Gen Intel Core i7 for $1,804 with THINKMEMDEALS coupon (was $3,609) at Lenovo
  • Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 (14-inch) with 13th Gen Intel Core i5 for $1,415 with THINKVOCW1 coupon (was $2,319) at Lenovo
  • Apple MacBook Pro (16-inch) M2 with 1TB SSD for $2,449 (was $2,699) at Amazon
  • Apple iPad Air (5th Gen) with M1 for $500 (was $600) at Amazon | Best Buy
  • Apple iPad Pro 12.9-inch with M2 for $1,049 (was $1,099) at Amazon
  • Microsoft Surface Pro 9 for up to $200 off various models at Microsoft
  • Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 for up to $300 off various models at Microsoft
  • Razer Blade 14 with AMD Ryzen 9 6900HX, RTX 3070 Ti for $2,200 (was $2,600) at Amazon

Sony's WH-1000XM5 (left) and WH-1000XM4 (right) wireless noise-canceling headphones. Sony promises improved active noise cancellation and audio quality with the XM5s. (credit: Jeff Dunn)
